entry.title: Trans Alpine - Whole Cherries - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Trans Alpine
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 56.99

Trans Alpine - Whole Cherries - 4 L

Put the cherry on top of your signature desserts with these maraschino cherries.

Featuring a vibrant red color, these maraschino cherries are sure to brighten up your menu items and bring something new to the table. These cherries are to add a more natural-looking decoration to your offerings. The bulk gallon jar ensures that there's plenty for you to use to match the color scheme of your next holiday display or special event.

Delicious Flavor

These cherries boast a crisp, sweet flavor and soft texture, making them a must-have topping for your restaurant, bar, ice cream shop, or bakery.

Resealable Container

To ensure optimum freshness, these cherries are picked at the peak of ripeness and packed in a hermetically sealed gallon container.

Versatile Ingredient

With their ruby red coloring and plump, juicy flesh, cherries are an excellent ingredient in a variety of desserts and cocktails. They're famous in pineapple upside down cakes, topping off any sundae, or garnishing a cocktail. With their juice, craft Shirley Temples or other cherry juice-based beverages. Plus, the juice can act as a natural food coloring dye, giving a beautiful pink hue to cake batters, housemade ice cream, and even gourmet marshmallows.

Nature's Taste -  Pineapple Slices - 6 x 2.84 L

The sweet, tropical flavor of these pineapple rings is a perfect addition to many meals and fruit-based drinks! Sliced in a classic ring shape, these pineapples make an excellent addition to your diner, cafeteria, or restaurant.

entry.title: Nature's Taste - Crushed Pineapple - 2.84 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nature's Taste
Type: FOOD
Price: 10.99

Nature's Taste -  Crushed Pineapple - 2.84 L

Add tropical island flair to your restaurant's menu with these cans of crushed pineapple! Naturally sweetened and subtly sour, the tender texture of crushed pineapple is ideal for a variety of recipes. Instantly enhance profitable menu items with fresh fruit taste, and add a pop of pineapple flavor to any meal or fruit-based drink! High in Vitamin C, the refreshing taste of pineapple is both nutritious and sure to serve up a satisfying sweetness.

entry.title: Swad - Kesar Mango Pulp - 3.1 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Swad
Type: FOOD
Price: 15.99

Swad - Kesar Mango Pulp - 3.1 Kg

This is the sweet, golden pulp derived from mangoes. The pulp is extracted from "Kesar" Mangoes, a sugary variety native to north india. It is great by itself or warmed and poured on Ice cream. It also makes a great ice cream shake. It is often used in sweets and yogurt drinks.

entry.title: Nature's Taste - Mandarin Orange - 2.84 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nature's Taste
Type: FOOD
Price: 10.99

Nature's Taste - Mandarin Orange - 2.84 L

Great for appetizers and desserts, these perfectly-sized, flavorful mandarin oranges soak in their naturally sweetened and slightly tangy juice. Slightly smaller and sweeter than traditional oranges, mandarin oranges make an excellent addition to cakes, meats, and stir fries.

They are packaged in a generously-sized can for easy preparation and superior service. Plus, their canned convenience makes it easy to serve a seasonal favorite year round!

Ingredients

Mandarins, Water, Sugar and Citric acid

entry.title: Pantry Shelf - Apple Sauce - Sweetened - 6 x 100 oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantry Shelf
Type: FOOD
Price: 41.99

Pantry Shelf - Apple Sauce - Sweetened - 6 x 2.84 L

With a familiar flavor, perfectly smooth texture, and a touch of added sweetness, this sweetened applesauce delivers fresh-from-the-orchard taste with a homemade feel.

It is great for offering as a delicious side dish on your kids' or breakfast menu, in buffet lines, or as an ingredient in popular dishes. Pour it over roasted meats for a sweet autumnal flavor, or use as a healthy alternative to oil and other fats in baked goods.

The possibilities are endless! It is packaged in a generously-sized can for easy preparation and great service.

entry.title: Nature's Taste - Peach Halves - 2.84 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nature's Taste
Type: FOOD
Price: 8.99

Nature's Taste -  Peach Halves - 2.84 L

Bring the sweet taste of peaches to your restaurant, bakery, or cafe with this can of peach halves in light syrup. Conveniently skinned and pitted, these peach halves are ready for baking. Whether you're baking traditional peach cobbler or trying out a new recipe for peach crisp to top ice cream, yogurt, or oatmeal, these peach halves are an essential addition to your pantry. Great for purees, glazes, and smoothies, you can create a variety of menu options ranging from drinks to desserts.

Already cut in half to save time in the kitchen, these sweet, juicy peaches are packaged in a convenient, generously-sized can for easy preparation and superior service. Indulge your guests in orchard-fresh peach taste with the convenience of canned fruit.

entry.title: Nature's Taste - Fruit Cocktail - 2.84 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nature's Taste
Type: FOOD
Price: 8.99

Nature's Taste -  Fruit Cocktail - 2.84 L

Indulge your customers with this fruit cocktail's perfect assortment of sweet and subtly tart classic fruit flavors. This fruit cocktail combines a brightly colored mix of juicy peaches and pears with tropical pineapples, crisp seedless grapes, and sugary cherries in light syrup. This mix of smooth citrus flavors also makes for a sweet end to any meal.

Ingredients

Peaches, Water, Pears, Grapes, Pineapple, Sugar, Artificially Coloured Cherries and Citrid Acid
